review: Dr. Shachee mam is very polite. She heard out all our issues with a lot of patience. The way she explained all our issues was very thorough and comprehensive. After arriving at an appropriate diagnosis , she explained everything very well.  I am very satisfied after her advice. Highly recommended.
Doctor was very polite she gives proper time to diagnose and guidance. Good lactation consult i must say.
